description: This parameter defines the number of devices the user is allowed to login simultaneously. Parameter  : Define the number of devices. Other parameters : leave them blank. Duration : 1 (default)

This parameter is used to integrate the woocomerce billing with Magoware management system. Parameter  :  URL of the woocomerce page (http(s)://yourdomainname). Parameter 1 : Consumer Key found on woocomerce admin page under advanced settings. Parameter 2 : Consumer Secret key found on woocomerce admin page under advanced settings

This parameter is used to integrate the Stripe billing system with Magoware management system. Parameter 1 : Publishable Key found on Stripe admin page under Development tools. Parameter 2 : Secret Key found on stripe admin page under Development tools.

This parameter is used to integrate the token for stream protection via Flussonic. Parameter  : TOKEN_KEY value used when configuring the token on Flussonic server. Parameter 1 : SALT value used when configuring the token on Flussonic server. Parameter 2 : PASSWORD used when configuring the token on Flussonic server. Parameter 3 : WINDOW value which determines the time in second the token is valuable.

This parameter id is used to integrate the token for stream protection via Akamai. Parameter  : TOKEN_KEY value used when configuring the token on Akamai server. Parameter 1 : SALT used when configuring the token on Flussonic server). Parameter 2 : WINDOW value which determines the time in second the token is valuable.
This parameter is used to integrate the PayPal account with the Magoware management system. Parameter : URL of webview for the payment. Parameter 1 : Secret Key found on PayPal account.
